name: One Armed Bandit
description:
Press F11 for fullscreen.

-x-x-x-

CONTROLS:

Arrow keys: movement
Q: Shoot or throw empty pistol
W: Draw or holster pistol
E: Pick up / drop
R: Pistol whip

-x-x-x-

STORY:

The Governor's men have been pillaging your homeland for years.

Their recent raid has laid waste to your village. You tried to fight back, but their numbers were too many. There is
absolutely nothing left, save for smoldering ruins.

You wake up delirious, with a stump in place of of your right arm.

With one arm and nothing to lose, you set out to recover your missing limb at all costs.

It is now a matter of principle and if you can steal some of their loot, perhaps your people can recover somewhat.
